dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.
dependencies.name: glib

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
The GObject Introspection is used to describe the program APIs and
collect them in a uniform, machine readable format.Cairo is a 2D
graphics library with support for multiple output
dependencies.name: gobject-introspection

dependencies.description:
intltool is a set of tools to centralize translation of many different
file formats using GNU gettext-compatible PO files.
dependencies.name: intltool

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description:
Vala is a programming language that aims to bring modern programming
language features to GNOME developers without imposing any additional
runtime requirements and without using a different ABI compared to
applications and libraries written in C.
dependencies.name: vala

dependent_to.description:
Thunar extension which enables automatic management of removable drives
and media.
dependent_to.name: thunar-volman

dependent_to.description:
Tumbler is a D-Bus service for applications to request thumbnails for
XFCE4
dependent_to.name: tumbler

dependent_to.description: Core libraries and applications for the Xfce4 desktop environment
dependent_to.name: xfce4-core

dependent_to.description:
Daemon, manager, and editor to centralize the configuration management
for XFCE4
dependent_to.name: xfce4-settings

dependent_to.description: xfconf - Configuration Storage System for XFCE4
dependent_to.name: xfconf

dependent_to.description: xfwm4 is the window manager for Xfce
dependent_to.name: xfwm4

description: Libxfce4util common non-GTK+ utilities among the Xfce applications.
name: libxfce4util

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
